name: Frog Hop
description: A cute and quirky old-school adventure platformer about a Frog named Hoppy searching for his frog friend Jumpy. Features a large variety of gimmicks, enemies, obstacles. Unique and challenging boss fights. Equip charms to alter your play style. It has hats.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8, or 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 200 MB available space
